readable.title: 2256231539_05c27179f1
readable.content: A child holds a football and runs from other children . A young boy in a blue uniform running with a football while playing a game of flag football . A young boy weating blue shorts and cleats holding a football running from other boys . A young male carrying a football and running while two other boys run behind him . The boy in blue runs with the ball whilst being chased by two boys in red .
